should_search.input: How should I handle a toxic high performer?
What does research say about psychological safety in teams?
How do I build executive presence?
I need to improve cross-functional collaboration between engineering and product.
How do I have a difficult conversation with someone who gets defensive?
What are evidence-based approaches to preventing burnout in my team?
I just started as a new VP. What should I focus on in my first 90 days?
How do I build a culture of candid feedback on my team?

should_not_search.input: Rewrite this email to be more direct: 'Hi team, I was wondering if maybe we could possibly consider looking into the option of potentially shifting our timeline a bit if that works for everyone?'

Make this feedback shorter: 'I wanted to share some thoughts on how the presentation went. Overall I think there were some areas that went well but there were also some areas where I think we could improve going forward if we want to be more effective.'

Rephrase this for a Slack message: 'I need to inform you that the deliverable originally scheduled for Friday will need to be postponed to the following Wednesday due to unforeseen technical complications.'
